introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Oglok is a traditional game similar to Sic Bo, but instead of numbers, it uses images. This game is very popular in the Asian region.

rules.title: Rules
steps: The game begins when the dealer opens the betting time.
Now you must place your bet on the provided betting panel and click the submit button.
After the betting period ends, the dealer will shuffle the dice to determine the results for that round.

The results are only from Shrimp to Fish for each die, and if the dice are not clearly positioned or do not land correctly, a 'no game' status will occur, and the dealer will reshuffle the dice until the result is clear.

one-dice-bet.title: One Dice
one-dice-bet.description: The result is a specific image from Shrimp to Fish on one, two, or all three dice.

two-series-bet.title: Two Dice Series
two-series-bet.description: The result is all triple images.

three-series-bet.title: Three Dice Series
three-series-bet.description: The result is a specific triple image that you bet on.

anytriple-bet.title: Any Triple
anytriple-bet.description: The result is any triple image.

4-combination-bet.title: 4-Dice Combination
4-combination-bet.description: The result is a combination of four dice that you bet on.

2-combination-bet.title: 2-Dice Combination
2-combination-bet.description: The result is a combination of two dice that you bet on.
